 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אֶשָּׁא‎</span> **noun [feminine]** ==fire== (Biblical Hebrew  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵשׁ‎</span>; [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 55, 5. 2 b</sup> thinks emphatic from onomatopoetic √ <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אשׁשׁ‎</span>; [[BDB#Dalm|D]]<sup>161</sup> [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]] √ <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אשׁא‎</span> compare [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אישָּׁא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אִישָּׁהָא‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; — [[Dan.7.11|Dan 7:11]]. <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אֻשֹּׁהִי‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אֻשַּׁיָּא‎</span> see [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אשׁ‎</span>]. above
